Text: More fact free bullshit from the tub of Lard himself

Your vulgar comment is as vapid as your intellect.
Stick to your 3 Stooges theme packs, etc. at the shallow end of the pool. 
Rush Limbaugh is a National Treasure, just as Will Rogers was in his time. Stay with your Air America .....woops..........they folded up into bankruptcy due to the embarrassing lack of FACTS and the overwhelmingly FEELINGS based view of their non-reality.
